## prepareDistributeUnsignedPsbt() function

Prepares an unsigned PSBT (Partially Signed Bitcoin Transaction) for distributing RGBPP assets. This function is used to estimate transaction fees before finalizing the transaction.

**Signature:**

```typescript
prepareDistributeUnsignedPsbt: ({ rgbppLockArgsList, receivers, xudtTypeArgs, collector, btcDataSource, btcTestnetType, isMainnet, fromBtcAccount, fromBtcAccountPubkey, btcFeeRate, }: PrepareDistributeUnsignedPsbtParams) => Promise<bitcoin.Psbt>
```
